title: Memoirs Of An Everyday Ex-General: A Dystopian American Tale
description: Memoirs Of An Everyday A Dystopian American Tale is Sage Baker’s debut novella. What would the world look like if California wanted to pull away from the United States and make its own rules? Colin Collins is about to find out. Follow Colin’s journey as his own moral and philosophical lens of the world is shaken to the core. Will Colin survive the war, and, more importantly, his own mind?Full of satirical commentary and packed with meaning, the story provides a profound view of how the world could be in just a few years. As with any dystopian story, it calls the reader to explore future possibilities and to heed its warnings.
author: Sage Baker
